extension_description.message: A browser extension that allows you to detect and (optionally) Counter-block users who blocked you on Twitter.

run_chainblock_from_followers_descriptio.message: Search the users that block you. (from their followers)

run_chainblock_from_following_descriptio.message: Search the users that block you. (from users followed by them)

running_chainblock_is_only_available_on_.message: Chain-MirrorBlock can be used only on Twitter.

please_run_on_profile_page_1.message: To run Chain-MirrorBlock, please go to the user's profile page.

options_description.message: Change the settings for the Mirror Block

block_reflection_description.message: Counter-Block: If Mirror Block detects an user that blocks you, It will block them.

outline_user_blocked_me.message: To make it more visible, Mirror Block displays a red outline to the users that block you.

enable_block_reflection_description.message: If Mirror Block detects an account that blocks you, It will block them.

block_muted_user_description.message: If you turn the option off, it doesn't block the user you have muted. If you turn this option on, it blocks whether it's muted or not.

always_immediately_block_mode_descriptio.message: Enables the "Block Upon Discovery" feature to default when executing a chain block.

warning_before_close.message: Closing the page or navigating to another page will stop the currently active Chain-MirrorBlock. Would you like to go on?

chainblock_still_running.message: The Chain-MirrorBlock is still running. Do you still want to close it?

confirm_mutual_block.message: Do you want to block $count$ users found by the Chain-MirrorBlock?

no_users_to_mutual_block.message: There is no user to block.

cant_chainblock_they_blocks_you.message: Unable to execute Chain-MirrorBlock because @$username$ is blocking you.

please_check_login_before_chainblock.message: Please check that you are logged in to Twitter.

error_occured_from_twitter_server.message: An error occurred on the Twitter server.

cant_chainblock_they_protected.message: Cannot execute a Chain-MirrorBlock on protected user: @$username$.

confirm_chainblock_to_followers.message: Do you want to run a Chain-MirrorBlock on @$username$'s followers?

confirm_chainblock_to_following.message: Do you want to run a Chain-MirrorBlock from the list of users that @$username$ follows?

warning_too_many_followers.message: Caution! If they have too many followers/followers, your account may trigger rate-limitation from Twitter. Are you sure you want to proceed?

chainblock_progress.message: Collected $scraped$ user(s) out of $total$, found a total of $found$ user(s).

chainblock_immediately_block_mode_toolti.message: If Mirror Block found the users that block you, It will block them without pressing the 'Block' button.

chainblock_rate_limited.message: Rate Limit: Too many followers. Temporarily restricted.

no_blockable_user.message: There are no users to counter-block.

run_chainblock_from_followers_contextmen.message: Run a chainblock on this user (follower)

run_chainblock_from_following_contextmen.message: Run a chainblock on this user (following)
